title: Someone Is Watching
description: After her boyfriend breaks up with her, Alaina makes a choice that will change her life forever.After witnessing a seemingly innocent man’s murder, Alaina wakes in an unfamiliar room with a pounding headache.When things go from bad to worse, she realizes people aren’t always as they appear to be, and even those closest to you are capable of becoming something unrecognizable.
author: London Bailey
